sentence: Not only does Mandela Barnes oppose holding bad actors like John Chisholm accountable, but he wants to enable more violent criminals like Darrell Brooks to walk free via reckless cash bail policies," said Anna Kelly, spokeswoman for the Republican Party.
author: Daniel Bice
title: Bice: U.S. Senate candidate Mandela Barnes favors eliminating cash bail nationally, aide says
